page.title: 08Plant Life
page.content: Plant Life opened in July nineteen eighty four as a plant whole saler.It also rents out plant arrangements to firms and offices.It opens from six a.m till six p.m,but the staff often work later.They employ about twelve people. They import small plants and seedlings from the continent where goverments subsidise,their growers.The most popular plants are azaleas. It has an old Artesian well which{ supplies all their water free of charge. They are optimistic about the future and plan to open more greenhouses.
